title: Glorious Gravel, Hot Springs, and Unexpected Wildlife Encounters at Rebecca’s Private Idaho
content:
Contributor Maureen Gaffney discovers the spirit of gravel — along with the efficacy of the Rabies vaccine — at Rebecca Rusch's beloved gravel event.

Read the full article at Glorious Gravel, Hot Springs, and Unexpected Wildlife Encounters at Rebecca’s Private Idaho on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
